Chicago.The Gogo Building: The Gogo Building, formerly known as the River Center, is an 840,000 square foot commercial building located at 111 N. Canal Street in the West Loop community area of Chicago, Illinois. Originally constructed as a warehouse in the early 1900s, the vintage, loft-style building is now home to various commercial tenants, most notably Gogo Inflight Internet, which has its logo on the cube topping the building. Other tenants include Twitter, Uber, Vivid Seats, Fieldglass, Potbelly Sandwich Works and Solstice Consulting.
